name: PHP Functions
description: Matches PHP Functions so you can strip those tags.Example: utf8_encode(func_ex($_GET["user"]))Result: func_ex($_GET["user"])Problem 1: Does not work for multiple functions on the same line. Ex: echo func_a('info').' '.func_b('info');Problem 2: Isn't as good for functions that pass multiple values as everything between the () is in $3
author: Brandon B
